article_title: Financial Tips and Advice for Retiring Early
article_text: Your browser is out of date. Please update your browser at http://update.microsoft.com

article_metadata.description: When it comes to early retirement, the real question is whether you can afford to clock out early. It may require tradeoffs, such as moving to a smaller home or picking and choosing your hobbies. Yet it may not be as big a stretch as you think. Here’s what you need to know.

og.description: Early retirement is again in reach, but the game has changed.
